C

COMBOBOX_INITIAL_SELECTED_INDEX - Static variable in class de.gnwi.psmilesviewer.Constants
Initial selected index for the ViewerPanel's JComboBox.
Constants - Class in de.gnwi.psmilesviewer
The non language-related constants for the PSmiles Viewer application.
Constants() - Constructor for class de.gnwi.psmilesviewer.Constants
 
Constants.AddStructureOptions - Enum in de.gnwi.psmilesviewer
An enum for the different modes of adding a PSmiles structure from the library to the ViewerPanel's JTextArea that holds their language-dependent representations.
Constants.ImageExportOptions - Enum in de.gnwi.psmilesviewer
An enum for the four different modes of exporting the PSmiles graph or the whole main frame that holds their language-dependent representations.
Constants.Shape - Enum in de.gnwi.psmilesviewer
An enum for the GraphStream node shape options (see StyleConstants.Shape) that combines the language-dependent representation of each option with the keyword that must be added as an 'ui.style' attribute to a node.
Controller - Class in de.gnwi.psmilesviewer
The PSmiles Viewer application's controller.
Controller(String, String) - Constructor for class de.gnwi.psmilesviewer.Controller
Constructor: It initialises the Controller's fields, adds various listeners to its Swing components, loads the UserPreferences from a '.ser' file and starts the application by setting the JFrame MainFrame visible.
createTip(String) - Static method in class de.gnwi.psmilesviewer.HTMLToolTip
Gives back a html formatted String for tool tips that has a width of Constants.TOOL_TIP_WIDTH.
